commit.message:
[Qt] remove trailing output-index from transaction-id

The trailing output-index leads to cases where the user can't look-up the transaction ID in various systems.

[Qt] remove trailing output-index from transaction-id

The trailing output-index leads to cases where the user can't look-up the transaction ID in various systems.
